name: The Network
description:
Synopsis

In The Network you play as Consuela. She uploaded some pictures to the cloud, and she wants to stop the upload! To do so, she jumped right into the world wide web, searching for the server.

Who we are

We are students in Amsterdam and made this during a school project called Project Game Development.

This game is made by

Sem Berretty

Tom Schrauwen

Frenk Timmer

Yasja de Miranda

Whalied Zaghloul

And me, Erik Oegema

Thanks for playing our game! (if you did so :))

Leave feedback in the comments, we highly appreciate that!
